Text: ArgentinaKen Our associates in Argentina called this morning and suggested that we arrange a trip with you to visit with the President in Buenos Aires any time in the next ten days They guarantee that the Water Company and TGS can be sold at fair prices with the full approval of the new government The investors are in place to purchase TGS the deal on the water company is the best deal Enron will be able to get now or in the future Please give me a ring if this is of interest to you by est because we are getting a call from the office of the President at est Best personal regards Steve Hacker
